messages.title: STOP BREXIT
messages.content: Brexit is a national embarrassment. Every day, more and more people are realising how important EU membership is to our country and our future. The Liberal Democrats want to Stop Brexit, call for a People's Vote and remain in the EU because it's best for our economy, environment and public services.

messages.title: LABOUR'S BREXIT LET DOWN
messages.content: Jeremy Corbyn has again rebuffed the demands of many of his own activists for Labour to become the party of remain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are committed to stopping Brexit, calling for a People's Vote and campaigning to remain in the EU.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn has again rebuffed the demands of many of his own activists for Labour to become the party of remain.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats want to Stop Brexit, call for a People's Vote and remain in the EU because it's best for our economy, environment and public services.
issues.economy: Stopping Brexit is best for our economy.
issues.environment: Remaining in the EU is best for our environment.

contactInformation.address: Lib Dems, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn has again rebuffed the demands of many of his own activists for Labour to become the party of remain.
[Corbyn] declined to say whether he would support 'Remain or Leave'
Labour is not a remain party?
19 Labour MPs who backed the Brexit deal
Mr Corbyn says Labour will negotiate a Brexit deal

images.caption: Liberal Democrats promotion material with messages regarding their stance on Brexit and criticism of Labour's position.
